overview:
Rick Backus is chief executive officer for CPC Strategy (CPC).

Rick is responsible for long-term financial, tactical and strategic planning for CPC and he ensures that each client we take on is the right fit for our management service. Heâ€™s a comparison shopping engine expert and frequently appears in ecommerce publications to discuss industry trends. Rick has been with CPC since January of 2007.

Before co-founding CPC, Rick worked as an account executive at PriceGrabber.com where he discovered a number of merchants were not maximizing their profits on the comparison shopping engines.

Backus holds a Bachelor of Arts degree in communications from the University of California, Los Angeles.
